meanings.definition: The act of not importing goods.
meanings.sent1: The nonimportations helped the country save money.
meanings.sent2: The store had a surplus of nonimportations due to the trade restrictions.
meanings.sent3: The nonimportations decided to take a vacation from traveling.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with nonimportations, symbolizing her frugal lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nonimportations was discussed in the economics class.

meanings.sent1: The warehouse was full of nonimportations waiting to be sold.
meanings.sent2: The market was flooded with nonimportations, causing prices to drop.
meanings.sent3: The nonimportations on the shelf looked lonely without any buyers.
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a museum, displaying various nonimportations from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The nonimportations were left untouched in the storage room for years.
